openGraph.title: Shopa
openGraph.description: Featurist took shopa.com from MVP in 2012 through successive rounds to series A funding in 2014.

quote.text: We have decided to work with Featurist on a number of large projects because they are the very best at what they do. They are able to provide us with a flexible working relationship and they are able to adapt themselves in anyway that ensures the best results occur.
quote.author: Peter Janes, Shopa / CEO
